languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс сухо усмехается.{/n} "Ты так решил{mf||а} из-за жестов, которые я изображал? Я не лгу, но и полной правдой мои слова не были".
{n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс сухо усмехается.{/n} "Ты так решил{mf||а} из-за жестов, которые я изображал? Я не лгу, но и полной правдой мои слова не были".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because of the tells I simulated? I did not lie, but my words were not entirely true either."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because of the tells I simulated? I did not lie, but my words were not entirely true either."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pousse un petit rire sans joie.{/n} « Avez-vous tiré cette conclusion parce que j'ai feint un comportement qui dénote le mensonge ? Eh bien, je n'ai pas menti, mais je n'ai pas non plus dit toute la vérité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pousse un petit rire sans joie.{/n} « Avez-vous tiré cette conclusion parce que j'ai feint un comportement qui dénote le mensonge ? Eh bien, je n'ai pas menti, mais je n'ai pas non plus dit toute la vérité. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se ríe con sequedad.{/n} «¿Ha llegado a esa conclusión solo porque he fingido unas "pistas" corporales? Bueno, no he mentido, pero tampoco he dicho toda la verdad».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se ríe con sequedad.{/n} «¿Ha llegado a esa conclusión solo porque he fingido unas "pistas" corporales? Bueno, no he mentido, pero tampoco he dicho toda la verdad».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希干笑了一声。{/n}“你之所以得出这个结论，是因为我假装做出了某些‘说谎的反应’，对吧？实际上，我并没有说谎，但我说的也并不是全部真相。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希干笑了一声。{/n}“你之所以得出这个结论，是因为我假装做出了某些‘说谎的反应’，对吧？实际上，我并没有说谎，但我说的也并不是全部真相。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは乾いた笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「その結論に至ったのは、私がある種の『言動』を装っていたからですか？まあ、嘘はついていませんが、本当のことを全て言ったわけでもないんです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは乾いた笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「その結論に至ったのは、私がある種の『言動』を装っていたからですか？まあ、嘘はついていませんが、本当のことを全て言ったわけでもないんです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lacht trocken.{/n} "Seid Ihr zu diesem Schluss gekommen, weil ich bestimmte 'verräterische' Verhaltensweisen gezeigt habe? Nun, ich habe nicht gelogen, habe aber auch nicht die ganze Wahrheit gesagt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lacht trocken.{/n} "Seid Ihr zu diesem Schluss gekommen, weil ich bestimmte 'verräterische' Verhaltensweisen gezeigt habe? Nun, ich habe nicht gelogen, habe aber auch nicht die ganze Wahrheit gesagt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix duygusuzca gülüyor.{/n} "Bu sonuca varmanın sebebi belli davranışsal 'ipuçlarım' mıydı? Yalan söylemedim ama gerçeğin tümünü de anlatmadım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix chuckles dryly.{/n} "Did you come to that conclusion because I feigned certain behavioural 'tells'? Well, I did not lie, but I did not tell the whole truth either."
